components.name: Slack Notification Sensor
components.description: Monitor Slack channels and trigger jobs based on messages or reactions
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Filesystem Monitor
components.description: Monitor local directories for new files and trigger jobs with file metadata via run_config
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: CSV File Ingestion
components.description: Ingest CSV files into Dagster assets with pandas DataFrames
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: S3 to Database
components.description: Load files from S3 into database tables, works with S3 sensors via run_config
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: REST API Fetcher
components.description: Fetch data from REST APIs with authentication support and multiple output formats
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: File Transformer
components.description: Transform files between formats (CSV, JSON, Parquet, Excel) with run_config support
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Database Query
components.description: Execute SQL queries against databases and materialize results as assets
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: DataFrame Transformer
components.description: Transform DataFrames from upstream assets using IO managers for automatic data flow
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Synthetic Data Generator
components.description: Generate realistic synthetic/mock data with multiple pre-defined schemas for demos and testing
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: DuckDB Table Writer
components.description: Write pandas DataFrames to DuckDB tables with automatic schema creation and flexible write modes
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Time Series Generator
components.description: Generate synthetic time-series data with configurable patterns, frequencies, and noise levels
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: DuckDB Query Reader
components.description: Read and transform data from DuckDB tables using SQL queries, creating new assets from query results
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Dependency Graph
components.description: Define dependencies between assets without modifying component schemas - enables fully YAML-based pipelines
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Asset Reference
components.description: Reference existing assets (dbt, Python, etc.) in pipeline definitions without creating new assets
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Enhanced Data Quality Checks
components.description: Comprehensive data quality validation framework with 15+ check types, automatic processing mode selection, grouping, historical trend analysis, and multi-asset configuration
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: LLM Prompt Executor
components.description: Execute prompts against LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, Hugging Face) with streaming, temperature control, and JSON mode
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Document Text Extractor
components.description: Extract text from PDF, DOCX, HTML, and other document formats with OCR support and metadata extraction
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Text Chunker
components.description: Split text into chunks using multiple strategies (fixed tokens, sentences, semantic) for embedding and LLM processing
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Embedding Generator
components.description: Generate vector embeddings using OpenAI, Sentence Transformers, Cohere, or Hugging Face models with batch processing
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Vector Store Writer
components.description: Write embeddings to vector databases (Pinecone, ChromaDB, Qdrant, FAISS) with metadata and batch operations
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Vector Store Query
components.description: Query vector databases for semantic search with configurable top-k and similarity thresholds
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: LLM Chain Executor
components.description: Execute chains of LLM calls with context passing and templating for multi-step reasoning
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Document Summarizer
components.description: Summarize documents using LLMs with map-reduce for long documents and multiple summary styles
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Text Classifier
components.description: Classify text using LLMs with custom categories, confidence scores, and reasoning explanations
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: Conversation Memory
components.description: Manage conversation history and context for multi-turn LLM interactions with automatic trimming
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: RAG Pipeline
components.description: Complete Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline combining query embedding, vector search, and LLM generation
components.author: Dagster Community

components.name: LLM Output Parser
components.description: Parse and validate LLM outputs into structured formats (JSON, CSV, lists) with schema validation
components.author: Dagster Community
